quote: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.

quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.

quote: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.

quote: Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen.

quote: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.

quote: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!

quote: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.

quote: There's no such thing as failure - just waiting for success.

name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.

quote: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
name: George Edward Woodberry

quote: You might well remember that nothing can bring you success but yourself.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: Anything that won't sell, I don't want to invent. Its sale is proof of utility, and utility is success.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Success is nothing if you don't have the right people to share it with; you're just gonna end up lonely.
name: Selena Gomez

quote: You know you are on the road to success if you would do your job, and not be paid for it.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I look at where I'm at today and realize that most of my success is owed to the mentors that was in my life.
name: Kendrick Lamar

quote: My success, literally, is your success figuratively.
name: Bo Burnham

quote: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Success is not greedy, as people think, but insignificant. That is why it satisfies nobody.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Success is dependent upon the glands - sweat glands.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: I've learned that mistakes can often be as good a teacher as success.
name: Jack Welch

quote: Success is not to be pursued; it is to be attracted by the person you become.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: How one handles success or failure is determined by their early childhood.
name: Harold Ramis

quote: True success has more components than one sentence or idea can contain.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Success is not two cars or a swimming pool. It's the approval of your peers.
name: Peter Finch

quote: Success is achieved by developing our strengths, not by eliminating our weaknesses.
name: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: The relationships we have with people are extremely important to success on and off the job.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: You do not pay the price of success, you enjoy the price of success.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Success must never be measured by how much money you have.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Each success only buys an admission ticket to a more difficult problem.
name: Henry Kissinger

quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
name: Colin R. Davis

quote: The first principle of success is desire - knowing what you want. Desire is the planting of your seed.
name: Robert Collier

quote: There's no escalators - there's only staircases to success. There is no substitute for hard work.
name: Lilly Singh

quote: Success - it's what you do with what you've got.
name: Woody Hayes

quote: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals.
name: Paul J. Meyer

quote: The victor belongs to the spoils.
name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: I think you can have 10,000 explanations for failure, but no good explanation for success.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: My definition of success is control.
name: Kenneth Branagh

quote: Once you have a lot of success, you become a target in many ways.
name: Jennifer Lopez

quote: For true success ask yourself these four questions: Why? Why not? Why not me? Why not now?
name: James Allen

quote: I think that success is having fun.
name: Bruno Mars

quote: I feel that gender balance in the work environment is actually the best recipe for success.
name: Anne Wojcicki

quote: Success in foreign policy, as in carpentry, requires the right tools for the job.
name: Richard N. Haass

quote: It is a career that can be enhanced or destroyed by success.
name: Warren Cuccurullo

quote: The greatest trap in our life is not success, popularity or power, but self-rejection.
name: Henri Nouwen

quote: I have only one understanding of development and of making success, and that's by going step by step.
name: Jurgen Klopp

quote: Singleness of purpose is one of the chief essentials for success in life, no matter what may be one's aim.
name: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Rockefeller once explained the secret of success. 'Get up early, work late - and strike oil.'
name: Joey Adams

quote: It's both rebellion and conformity that attack you with success.
name: Amy Tan

quote: In the United States, I am a great success, but I am not a celebrity.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: When it comes to success, there are no shortcuts.
name: Bo Bennett

quote: You never achieve success unless you like what you are doing.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Success is the sum of details.
name: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: Much effort, much prosperity.
name: Euripides

quote: Everything I have, my career, my success, my family, I owe to America.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: People are the key to success or extraordinary success.
name: Azim Premji

quote: Fourth Law of Thermodynamics: If the probability of success is not almost one, then it is damn near zero.
name: David R. Ellis

quote: Prospering just doesn't have to do with money.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Life is bigger than cinema. Cinema is just a part of life, so I never take success or failure seriously.
name: Pawan Kalyan

quote: The single most important key to success is to be a good listener.
name: Kelly Wearstler

quote: Success, to me, is just doing things that I'm really proud of.
name: Dua Lipa

quote: I've had my share of struggle. I believe, never take success to your head or failure to your heart.
name: Randeep Hooda

quote: He has achieved success who has worked well, laughed often, and loved much.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: If a man loves the labour of his trade, apart from any question of success or fame, the gods have called him.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: A great secret of success is to go through life as a man who never gets used up.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Success is the sweetest revenge.
name: Vanessa Williams

quote: The preparation is what allows the success to happen naturally.
name: Jake Arrieta

quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: People seldom see the halting and painful steps by which the most insignificant success is achieved.
name: Anne Sullivan

quote: My fears are never about failure - it's about extreme success.
name: Lil Dicky

quote: You can't go into business thinking that success will come to you in just one or two years.
name: Do Won Chang

quote: Success is a process, a quality of mind and way of being, an outgoing affirmation of life.
name: Alex Noble

quote: I suppose your security is your success and your key to success is your fine palate.
name: Gordon Ramsay

quote: As a kid from Compton, you can get all the success in the world and still question your worth.
name: Kendrick Lamar

quote: The great secret of success is to go through life as a man who never gets used up.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Success is that old ABC - ability, breaks, and courage.
name: Charles Luckman

quote: Success is always temporary. When all is said and one, the only thing you'll have left is your character.
name: Vince Gill

quote: To be ready to fail is to be prepared for success.
name: Jose Bergamin

quote: Pray that success will not come any faster than you are able to endure it.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Success breeds success.
name: Mia Hamm

quote: I thought doing reality TV would be the greatest success of my life or the biggest mistake.
name: Bethenny Frankel

quote: BTS as a group sort of took off with the success of our 2015 album that had our hit single 'I Need U.'
name: RM

quote: I've had great success being a total idiot.
name: Jerry Lewis

quote: Your chances of success in any undertaking can always be measured by your belief in yourself.
name: Robert Collier

quote: The key to Turkey's success has been its ability to reinvent itself as times change.
name: Stephen Kinzer

quote: People fall forward to success.
name: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Unless life is one giant rap battle, you don't need to freestyle your way to success.
name: Luvvie Ajayi

quote: I'd had my time in the charts and made loads of money. I was no longer hungry for success.
name: Rick Astley

quote: I was 40 years old before I became an overnight success, and I'd been publishing for 20 years.
name: Mary Karr

quote: To know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded.
name: Bessie Anderson Stanley

quote: Success is about enjoying what you have and where you are, while pursuing achievable goals.
name: Bo Bennett

quote: There's no right or wrong, success or failure.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: Never did a government commence under auspices so favorable, nor ever was success so complete.
name: James Monroe

quote: Philanthropy is the thing that I am really excited about, and having success means I can do more.
name: will.i.am

quote: From success you get a lot of things, but not that great inside thing that love brings you.
name: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: Picture yourself vividly as winning, and that alone will contribute immeasurably to success.
name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: We fall forward to succeed.
name: Mary Kay Ash

quote: That's the key to success, isn't it? It has to be fun.
name: Monica Seles

quote: I constantly think I'm a fraud - that this success is not warranted or justified.
name: David Chang

quote: Anytime you play a team sport, the success of the team really makes everything better. It's nice.
name: Ricky Williams

quote: Success isn't everything but it makes a man stand straight.
name: Lillian Hellman

quote: Success represents the 1% of your work which results from the 99% that is called failure.
name: Soichiro Honda

quote: Those who have succeeded at anything and don't mention luck are kidding themselves.
name: Larry King

quote: It's the steady, quiet, plodding ones who win in the lifelong race.
name: Robert W. Service

quote: I think success has no rules, but you can learn a great deal from failure.
name: Jean Kerr

quote: That is an important part of my success. Another big part of my success is that I hated not to finish a race.
name: Alain Prost

quote: I think success shows a person's true colors.
name: Freddie Prinze, Jr.

quote: You cannot learn anything from success, you only learn from failure.
name: Jim Dale

quote: I believe that great success is possible in any field - from music to mathematics to macro trading.
name: Paul Tudor Jones

quote: Do whatever interests you the most. Passion breeds success.
name: Shane Smith

quote: If you have a successful run, everything comes to you. Nothing succeeds like success.
name: John Barry

quote: 'Sugar Cane Alley' had a lot of international success, big success everywhere.
name: Euzhan Palcy

quote: Success cannot come from standstill men. Methods change and men must change with them.
name: James Cash Penney

quote: In this world it is not what we take up, but what we give up, that makes us rich.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: No one can possibly achieve any real and lasting success or 'get rich' in business by being a conformist.
name: J. Paul Getty

quote: When you win, nothing hurts.
name: Joe Namath

quote: The man who has done his level best... is a success, even though the world may write him down a failure.
name: B. C. Forbes

quote: There is no such thing as a permanent advertising success.
name: Leo Burnett

quote: Success is self-defined. You can choose what you think success is, and you can always change your mind.
name: Mark Manson

quote: Anybody that's intimidated by my success probably isn't the right person for me.
name: Alexa Hirschfeld

quote: I am not fighting for success, just to get more beauty out of myself and share it with more people.
name: Ben Okri

quote: It's not easy to have success with restaurants in different cities, but I like the challenge.
name: Alain Ducasse

quote: I'm happy for the success that I've had, but I've worked so hard at it.
name: Jenni Rivera

quote: I'm not even aware of my success. Success is such an illusion.
name: Juliette Binoche

quote: The toughest thing about success is that you've got to keep on being a success.
name: Irving Berlin

quote: One fails forward toward success.
name: Charles Kettering

quote: It's not enough that I should succeed - others should fail.
name: David Merrick

quote: Success is not judged by just success in a particular championship.
name: Lin Dan

quote: Everyone is looking for the hack, the secret to success without hard work.
name: Sam Altman

quote: A postsecondary education is the ticket to economic success in America.
name: Arne Duncan

quote: You cannot underestimate the value of luck in success in life. And I've really learned to appreciate that.
name: Azim Premji

quote: Nothing reinforces a professional relationship more than enjoying success with someone.
name: Harold Ramis

quote: If you can figure out my success on the screen, you're a better man than I.
name: Alan Ladd

quote: Muslims must believe that all power, success and victory comes from God alone.
name: Abu Bakar Bashir

quote: I'm using the success I've had to help other people shine.
name: Justin Tranter

quote: My secret to success is that I've always loved good music and people.
name: Sid Bernstein

quote: If you can measure success in this business based on happiness alone I feel like I've hit the lottery.
name: Justin Long

quote: Success is often the result of taking a misstep in the right direction.
name: Al Bernstein

quote: Spend enough time around success and failure, and you learn a reverence for possibility.
name: Dale Dauten

quote: Desire is the most important factor in the success of any athlete.
name: Bill Shoemaker

quote: The success of any great moral enterprise does not depend upon numbers.
name: William Lloyd Garrison

quote: Sometimes I worry about being a success in a mediocre world.
name: Lily Tomlin

quote: Nothing recedes like success.
name: Walter Winchell

quote: It goes without saying that it's hard to attain a certain level of success.
name: T.I.

quote: They succeed, because they think they can.
name: Virgil

quote: Success is usually the culmination of controlling failure.
name: Sylvester Stallone

quote: My formula for success is rise early, work late, and strike oil.
name: J. Paul Getty

quote: I hope the Final Five has shown that everyone is capable of success if they work hard.
name: Laurie Hernandez

quote: I don't care about commercial success. I get to do what I love and communicate whatever I want.
name: Sia

quote: Success to me is having ten honeydew melons and eating only the top half of each slice.
name: Barbra Streisand

quote: In a balanced organization, working towards a common objective, there is success.
name: Arthur Helps

quote: Success is based on your perspective.
name: CM Punk

quote: Can you imagine what I would do if I could do all I can?
name: Jeff Rich

quote: It's our nature: Human beings like success but they hate successful people.
name: Carrot Top

quote: Nothing succeeds like success.
name: Alexandre Dumas

quote: The one phrase you can use is that success has a thousand fathers, and failure is an orphan.
name: Alan Price

quote: Success is the space one occupies in the newspaper. Success is one day's insolence.
name: Elias Canetti

quote: The secret of my success is my hairspray.
name: Richard Gere

quote: I don't think about financial success as the measurement of my success.
name: Christie Hefner

quote: The success and the failure are not my concern, but His.
name: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

quote: To design the future effectively, you must first let go of your past.
name: Charles J. Givens
